title: The KHAN: Hard-boiled ex-federal agent tracks the international arms dealer, The Khan, from New Mexico to Mongolia
description: An action packed, hard-boiled detective thriller. If you like breathless action with gun battles, knife fights, airport explosions, and associated mayhem, this novel is for you.  Riveting action, heart thumping excitement, and dogged persistence describe this book. From the American Southwest to urban ghettos, the wastelands of Asia, and the deserts of Mexico, this techno-thriller delivers. This adventure story begins when cashiered ex - OSI Special Agent David Dunn runs across the trail of an old nemesis, the international arms dealer, known only as THE KHAN. David and his boss, Olivia, follow the Khan's bloody trail from Santa Fe, New Mexico to Denver, Colorado and then to New York City. Afterwards the action shifts to the mountains of the Middle East regions in the Kurdistan region. This action packed story will hold you mesmerized as the hard-boiled detective ruthlessly pursues his goal of revenge against the Khan.  This book is filled with nonstop action as members engaged in the illegal arms trade will stop at nothing to deter David in his quest to find THE KHAN.
author: E.B. Warren
